## Functions

<table><thead><tr><th>

Function


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

[sharp2(process, options)](./gulp-sharp2.sharp2.md)


</td><td>

Plugin fabric function.

Returns Gulp plugin stream for transformation images with [Sharp](https://www.npmjs.com/package/sharp)<!-- -->.

Used in pipeline with other Gulp plugins.

This function create new [Sharp](https://www.npmjs.com/package/sharp) object with options from second parameter (if specified). Image, loaded by Sharp object, - from gulp pipeline. The created Sharp object used as parameter when process function (first parameter) is calling. After process is finished, this plugin send new gulp file to pipeline with content from `Sharp.toBuffer()`<!-- -->.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
